## matchSchemaAgainstRule() function

Checks if a given schema matches a specific rule from a rule set

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function matchSchemaAgainstRule(rule: string, schema: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rule | string | The rule to match schema against |
|  schema | string | The schema to be matched against the rule |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
